document.heading: Dedication and Designation of Patricia Roberts Harris Drive, N.E., S.O. 85-189, and Street Naming Amendment Act of 1988

history.narrative: Law 7-102, the “Dedication and Designation of Patricia Roberts Harris Drive, N.E., S.O. 85-189, and Street Naming Amendment Act of 1988,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 7-255, which was referred to the Committee of the Whole. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on February 2, 1988 and February 16, 1988, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on March 2, 1988, it was assigned Act No. 7-147 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
